description: Charming craftsman home with original details. Note: The property line partially overlaps with the neighbor's fence on the north side.
legal_notes: Prescriptive easement potential, Lead-paint disclosure required.

description: Large industrial warehouse with high ceilings. Historically used for metal plating and chemical storage.
legal_notes: Phase II Environmental Assessment recommended due to past use.

description: Luxury coastal property with panoramic views. Property contains a small protected wetland area at the base of the cliff.
legal_notes: Coastal Commission restrictions apply, Riparian rights included.

description: Unimproved mountain lot with dense pine coverage. Public water and sewer are 200 feet from the property line.
features: 2.5 acres, Sloped terrain, No current structures.
legal_notes: Easement for utility extension required, Wildfire mitigation zone.

description: Modern loft in a converted textile mill. The HOA has a pending special assessment for roof repairs starting next quarter.
features: 2 beds, 2 baths, Exposed brick, 1 parking spot.
legal_notes: Pending litigation on HOA reserves, Right of first refusal applies.
